Title: Skink Oracle on Troglodon
Legend: Conduits of celestial magic, the Oracles are blessed with a portion of the slann’s magical might. They are the only skinks capable of taming the foul Troglodons, directing the loathsome beasts to slake their hunger on the enemies of the Seraphon.
Intro: A Skink Oracle on Troglodon is armed with a Divining Rod.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Coalesced Eternity Guardians • Shadowstrike Starhost • Shadowstrike Temple-host • Starborne Eternity Guardians

Rules.Name: Wizard
Rules.Rule: WIZARD: This unit can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Troglodon is armed with Noxious Spittle, Taloned Forelimbs and Venomous Jaws.

Rules.Name: Regeneration
Rules.Fluff: Troglodons are able to mend injured flesh almost as soon as they are harmed.
Rules.Rule: At the start of the hero phase, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this unit.

Rules.Name: Stench Of Death
Rules.Fluff: These creatures bring the foul reek of their swampland homes to battle, offending the senses of those not accustomed to it.
Rules.Rule: Stench of Death: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by enemy units within 9" of any friendly units with this ability.

Rules.Name: Terror
Rules.Fluff: This terrifying monstrosity strikes fear into the hearts of its foes.
Rules.Rule: Enemy units cannot receive the Inspiring Presence command while they are within 3" of any friendly units with this ability.

Rules.Name: Venomous Spittle
Rules.Fluff: The venom that drips from a Troglodon’s jaws is extremely toxic and highly corrosive.
Rules.Rule: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with this unit’s Noxious Spittle or Venomous Jaws is 6, that attack causes a number of mortal wounds to the target equal to the weapon’s Damage characteristic and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound roll or save roll).

Rules.Name: Primordial Mire
Rules.Fluff: Wielding reality-shifting powers that are typically the province of the slann, an Oracle transmutes a portion of the battlefield into primal swampland, the favoured hunting ground of their Troglodon mounts.
Rules.Rule: Primordial Mire is a spell that has a casting value of 7 and a range of 12". If successfully cast, pick 1 objective or terrain feature within range and visible to the caster. Until your next hero phase, units within 3" of that objective or terrain feature cannot run or retreat and must halve the result of any charge rolls. This spell has no effect on SKINK units and units that can fly.
